dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S663 IS: California Milk Marketing Order Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Feinsteinintroduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to theCommittee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To provide for the inclusion of the State of California as a separate Federal milk marketing order upon the petition and approval of California dairy producers of such inclusion.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the California Milk Marketing Order Act .

section.header: Inclusion of California as separate milk marketing order

subsection.text: Upon the petition and approval of California dairy producers in the manner provided in section 8c of the Agricultural Adjustment Act(7 U.S.C. 608c), reenacted with amendments by theAgricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, theSecretary of Agricultureshall designate the State of California as a separate Federal milk marketing order.
If designated undersubsection (a), the order covering California shall have the right to reblend and distribute order receipts to recognize quota value.
